content.rendered:
Client

Steve Angello & Size Records

Services

Motion

Studio Size produced a series of videos for renowned DJ Steve Angello to promote his North American tour “SIZE XX”. The performances took place at notable venues like New City Gas in Montreal, Cermak Hall in Chicago, and the iconic Brooklyn Mirage in NYC—a show fans consider unforgettable. The footage, sourced from visual artist Alexander Wessely, underwent our comprehensive art direction, which included design, motion graphics, sound design, and video editing. We aimed to balance the familiar with the unexpected, crafting an aesthetic that is both recognizable and innovative.

Kinetic typography, subtly diverging from industry norms, is an integral part of the distinctive visual identity.
